channel.title: GPU on 兰秋十六
channel.description: Recent content in GPU on 兰秋十六

item.title: NVIDIA NVML Driver/library version mimatch 解决办法
item.description: ###问题描述：执行nvidia-smi命令的时候出现一下错误： root@localhost:/mnt/md0/lotusWorker# nvidia-smi Failed to initialize NVML: Driver/library version mismatch 解决办法：卸载原先加载的驱动 sudo rmmod nvidia_drm sudo rmmod nvidia_uvm sudo rmmod nvidia_modeset sudo rmmod nvidia # 再次执行nvidia_smi
